meanings.definition: To reverse or undo an event or action that has occurred.
meanings.sent1: She wished she could unhappens the mistake she made in the game.
meanings.sent2: He tried to unhappens the spilled milk by cleaning it up quickly.
meanings.sent3: Trying to unhappens a burnt toast by scraping it only made it worse.
meanings.sent4: The magician's trick was like unhappensing a disappearing act in reverse.
meanings.sent5: The time machine promised to unhappens any regrettable decisions from the past.

meanings.sent1: The safety measures in place helped unhappens any accidents at the construction site.
meanings.sent2: She hoped her umbrella would unhappens her from getting wet in the rain.
meanings.sent3: Wearing a helmet can unhappens head injuries while biking.
meanings.sent4: His quick reflexes were like a shield that could unhappens any danger.
